name: http-api-caller
description: Make HTTP requests to external APIs. Supports GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE with headers, body, query params, authentication, timeout, and retry.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: http_api_caller
toolDefinition.description: Make HTTP requests to external APIs with full control over method, headers, body, query parameters, timeout, and retry policy.

body.description: Request body (object for JSON, string for text)

queryParams.description: URL query parameters as key-value pairs

retries.description: Number of retries on failure (default: 0, max: 3)

auth.description: Auth config: { type: 'bearer'|'basic', token?, username?, password? }
